messages.title: MODERATE CONSERVATIVES SPEAK OUT
messages.content: Can you trust Boris Johnson's Con-Brexit Party?

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Tories can't win here. It's 36 years since they did. They haven't even elected a councillor since 2000. The Lib Dems can win in Oxford! 2019 EU Election Results for Oxford City: LIB DEMS 40%, GREEN 23%, LAB 14%

issues.brexitEurope: JEREMY CORBYN BACKS BREXIT. Corbyn is letting down Labour Remainers by staying neutral on Brexit. Oxford Labour candidate Anneliese Dodds has always voted for Brexit.

endorsements.endorsement: "I'm impressed by Jo Swinson. I think if I was living in a lot of constituencies I would vote for the Liberal Democrats"
"I'm not sure yet, but I may protest and vote Lib Dem"

endorsements.endorser: Former Conservative Deputy PM Michael Heseltine
endorsements.endorsement: "Millions of Tories will now vote Lib Dem because of Brexit"

quotes.text: "Say no to Johnson and Corbyn and all of their candidates. Start the process of building something new"

examples: The Tories can't win here. It's 36 years since they did. They haven't even elected a councillor since 2000.
The Lib Dems can win in Oxford!
"Millions of Tories will now vote Lib Dem because of Brexit"
"I'm impressed by Jo Swinson. I think if I was living in a lot of constituencies I would vote for the Liberal Democrats"
Building a brighter future for Oxford East
Jeremy Corbyn backs Brexit. Corbyn is letting down Labour Remainers by staying neutral on Brexit. Oxford Labour candidate Anneliese Dodds has always voted for Brexit.
"I'm impressed by Jo Swinson. I think if I was living in a lot of constituencies I would vote for the Liberal Democrats" - Former Conservative Minister David Gauke
"I'm not sure yet, but I may protest and vote Lib Dem" - Ken Clarke
"Millions of Tories will now vote Lib Dem because of Brexit" - Former Conservative Deputy PM Michael Heseltine
Jeremy Corbyn backs Brexit. Corbyn is letting down Labour Remainers by staying neutral on Brexit. Oxford Labour candidate Anneliese Dodds has always voted for Brexit.
Can you trust Boris Johnson's Con-Brexit Party?

Jeremy Corbyn backs Brexit. Corbyn is letting down Labour Remainers by staying neutral on Brexit. Oxford Labour candidate Anneliese Dodds has always voted for Brexit.
